Text:
Ah, my lord... I did it, now I can make that
curry...!
Gamma...why do you look so beat up?

Th-These wounds...are nothing. The greater the risk,
the greater the reward.

Y-Yes...welcome back. Just looking at you like that,
it must've been some adventure, huh?

But that alone was worth the price paid. Because...
I have obtained...the finest ingredients!

Um...yeah, that wasn't what I was saying, the...bandage on
your finger...

Oh, I just had a short fall from a high mountain!
Nothing to worry about!

There's no way this could ever be from accidentally
cutting myself while cooking, oh ho ho ho!

If you're going to make an excuse, you don't have to be
that dramatic about it.
Really, are you okay...?

Hehe, it's nothing to worry about... Oh, my nose is
bleeding....

Ahem! But onto more important matters, please try
my finest curry!
This is...

(My curry is made with high quality and carefully
seasoned wild pork and miraculous potatoes from
the mountainside.)

After cutting up the ingredients to make them bite-
sized, I carefully stir-fried them so they didn't burn,
and then briefly boiled them in soup.
Please have the finest curry ever made!

Hehe, my lord is speechless at the sight of my
finest curry...

This curry looks rather soupy... But...soup-type
curries do exist, so I'll give it a try.
How do you like it?
It's hard to eat with you staring at me like that.
Oh?! My apologies.
Okay...bon app√©tit.
It doesn't...smell like anything.
Smell...?
*munch*...
*gulp*...!
...Gamma.
Y-Yes, my lord!
First of all, this isn't curry

How could this be? I followed his instructions...
All that hard work for nothing.
But it's still delicious, so please, calm down.
Oh, my!!

Regardless, my lord still praised me for my work.
It made my heart feel like a clear, sunny day.
Where I'm from, we call this meat and potatoes.

Meat and potatoes...? So it's a different kind
of food which resembles curry.

Well, they use the same ingredients. The biggest
difference between them are the spices.
Spices? ...Ah!

I just remembered... You mentioned that spices
were crucially important!

I'm t-t-terribly sorry! I completely forgot to add in
the spices...
Don't worry about it. Just call this a lucky break.
Uh, do you mean that in a good way?

Of course, I do. But I originally wanted to have
yellow curry.

But where I'm from, meat and potatoes have the same
homely taste as yellow curry.

In other words, while this is different from what I
wanted you to cook for me, it's still pretty much
what I was hoping for.

I s-suppose you're right...! I'm glad I could give
you what you were hoping for...!
I'm sure my lord said this to not hurt my feelings.

I feel so blessed to be of service to such a kind,
strong, and great lord.

The next time you make curry, be sure not to forget
the spices. No matter how many times it needs to be
said, spice is the key ingredient.

Y-Yes, my lord! I shall repeat the word "spices"
everyday so I won't forget next time!

I shall learn from my mistakes and take advantage of
my next chance. I shall remember that.
Next time, I will make you real curry! Just you wait!
I look forward to it... But, this is also fine.
Of course! It uses very specific ingredients!

Ah, my lord is eating the curry...or rather,
the "meat and potatoes" that I made!
I still have more! Please eat to your heart's content!

Uh, yeah, no...since I can't eat that much, we
should...let everyone else try it.

All members of the Seven Shadows? Yes, if that is
what you wish, my lord...
Everyone should know what a delicious meal you made.
My lord...!

My lord's kindness sets my heard ablaze. I feel tears
well up in my eyes, and wipe them away with my
bandaged finger.
Very well! Everyone! Time to eat!
Graah! I dunno what this is, but it's tasty!

Delta, stop eating with your hands. And Eta, don't
read while you eat.

Epsilon was supposed to be cooking today... I hope
you asked her first...

The taste is simple, but it's not that bad.
It suits Gamma's skills well.
So you can honestly say that it's good?
Just don't go overboard...

Can't we all just concentrate on eating whenever we
eat?

As hard as it is for her to admit, even Epsilon ate
all of it...

For a brief moment just now, I feel as if I truly
belong among the Seven Shadows.
I am grateful to my lord for giving me this chance...

When the next time and the time after that comes,
I shall prove my usefulness to him...!
*munch, munch* Yes...this is delicious!

And then, the taste of victory left me intoxicated
for a brief period.
